data.eml:eml: Gelderland Trust foundations cover 12,000 ha of historical terrain and 33 castles. Together these represent over 135 of the most beautiful sites in Gelderland. In addition, they are the proud owner of a museum collection of 18,000 pieces, which is largely nationally registered.Positive observations without protocolDataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl19 records (March 2018)
